data.event: Monroe was first settled in 1800 and was officially incorporated in 1822.
Monroe was first settled in 1800 and was officially incorporated in 1822.

event.title: 1885, however, a railroad line was built

data.event: In 1885, however, a railroad line was built between neighboring Readsboro, Vermont, and Holyoke to haul wood pulp to a paper factory.
